SELECT temp.process_code, temp.position_name, ROUND(AVG(temp.use_seconds) / 60) AS avgWorkTime FROM (SELECT pf.material_id, pf.position_id, p.process_code, p.name as position_name,
pf.use_seconds
max(pf.use_seconds) as use_seconds
FROM production_feature pf JOIN material ma ON pf.material_id = ma.material_id JOIN v_model vm ON vm.model_id = ma.model_id JOIN position p ON p.position_id = pf.position_id JOIN material_process mp ON ma.material_id = mp.material_id AND mp.line_id = #{line_id} WHERE (pf.operate_result = 2 OR pf.operate_result = 6) AND pf.finish_time >= #{finish_time_start} AND pf.finish_time < DATE_ADD(#{finish_time_end},INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND p.process_code not in ('200','251','252','301','302','303','321','400')
AND p.process_code in (${process_codes})
AND pf.section_id = #{section_id}
AND p.line_id = #{line_id}
AND vm.category_id = #{category_id}
AND ma.model_id = #{model_id}
AND ma.level IN (1,2,3)
AND ma.level IN (9,91,92,93,96,97,98,99)
AND ma.level IN (56,57,58,59)
AND mp.px = 0
AND mp.px in (1, 4, 7)
AND mp.px = 2
AND mp.px = 3
AND mp.px = 4
AND mp.px = 7
AND p.position_id NOT IN (select sub_position_id from position_group)
GROUP BY pf.material_id, pf.position_id
) temp GROUP BY temp.position_id ORDER BY (temp.process_code like '5%') DESC, temp.process_code
